english.segment1: How many times did I not stand up for you?. Face to face with someone I hardly knew?. Where did they go from there?
english.segment2: Lost in the world. And we may never meet again. God, will you send another light to lead them in?. Where will they go from there?
english.segment3: Love, show me the way. When I'm afraid to say the right thing. I'm a stone, Frozed in place. I need your grace to show me how to love
english.segment4: How many lives could be changed. If I'd convey all of the words that I was scared to say. Show me the way from here
english.segment5: Love, show me the way. When I'm afraid to say the right thing. I don't know where they will go. As long as I know I have shown Your love
english.segment6: I am lost without Your love
